title: door valve and hinge friction range

content.raw:
I understand that in task 3 the door valve and the door hinge friction will be randomized, but do we have a range that the friction will fall in, just as we have for the satellite wheels?

I tried to turn the door valve with the same maneuver I used with the satellite wheels and it doesn't even budge.  That makes sense on an airlock door!  However, it seems reasonable that we would know what the possible range of friction would be.
content.html:
I understand that in task 3 the door valve and the door hinge friction will be randomized, but do we have a range that the friction will fall in, just as we have for the satellite wheels?

I tried to turn the door valve with the same maneuver I used with the satellite wheels and it doesn't even budge. That makes sense on an airlock door! However, it seems reasonable that we would know what the possible range of friction would be.
